inclusion.criterion: Patients scheduled for an elective RARP
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with ASA III-IV risk status,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: renal or hepatic failure and patients on statin or steroid therapy were excluded.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients converted to laparotomy during surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. Shiga-like toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) stx1/stx2 were found in stools.
